data.comment: The match has started, with Atalanta kicking-off.
Throw-in for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 7, Atalanta drive upfield and Remo Freuler gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In Bergamo, Marten De Roon of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 7, Berat Djimsiti for the home team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Atalanta push forward at Gewiss Stadium and Duvan Zapata gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Fiorentina defence.
In the minute 10, Atalanta push forward at Gewiss Stadium and Hans Hateboer gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fiorentina defence.
Important block from the Fiorentina defence as Hans Hateboer fires in a strike for Atalanta.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 13, Maurizio Mariani awards Atalanta a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bergamo.
Ruslan Malinovskyi (Atalanta) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Free kick for Atalanta in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 19, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Cristian Romero (Atalanta) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 22, In Bergamo Fiorentina drive forward through Dusan Vlahovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Erick Pulgar (Fiorentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 22, Fiorentina are coming forward and Cristiano Biraghi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Atalanta have a goal kick.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 23, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
In the minute 25, Maurizio Mariani awards the home team a throw-in.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Atalanta.
Can Atalanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 29, In Bergamo, Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 30, In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atalanta's Ruslan Malinovskyi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Atalanta have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Duvan Zapata (Atalanta) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Fiorentina.
In the minute 35, Important block from the Fiorentina defence as Duvan Zapata fires in a strike for Atalanta.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Atalanta's Hans Hateboer is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Atalanta throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Atalanta at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Fiorentina at Gewiss Stadium.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In Bergamo, Marten De Roon of Atalanta is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 44, Robin Gosens puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Duvan Zapata.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Gewiss Stadium.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Fiorentina kick-off.
In the minute 46, Maurizio Mariani awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
The away team replace Erick Pulgar with Gaetano Castrovilli.
Free kick Fiorentina.
In the minute 48, Atalanta have a goal kick.
Atalanta drive forward but Matteo Pessina is judged offside.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 51, Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atalanta's half?
Maurizio Mariani signals a Atalanta throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
In the minute 54, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Atalanta.
In the minute 54, Free kick in a good position for Atalanta!
Fiorentina's Sofyan Amrabat has been booked in Bergamo.
Goal! Ruslan Malinovskyi extends Atalanta's lead to 2-0.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bergamo.
In the minute 58, In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Atalanta goal kick.
Franck Ribery is replacing Valentin Eysseric for Fiorentina at Gewiss Stadium.
Jose Callejon is on a sub for Pol Lirola for Fiorentina.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Atalanta.
Atalanta have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 61, Free kick Atalanta.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Gewiss Stadium.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
In the minute 63, Rafael Toloi heads in to give Atalanta a 3-0 lead at Gewiss Stadium.
Great play from Berat Djimsiti to set up the goal.
In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 64, Atalanta will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fiorentina.
Fiorentina pushes forward through Cristiano Biraghi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Atalanta.
Cristian Romero for Atalanta has been booked by Maurizio Mariani and receives a first yellow card.
Dusan Vlahovic (Fiorentina) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 67, Maurizio Mariani awards Atalanta a goal kick.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Atalanta territory.
Free kick for Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bergamo.
Throw-in Atalanta.
Can Atalanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 71, Fiorentina make their fourth substitution with Christian Kouame replacing Dusan Vlahovic.
Maurizio Mariani signals a throw-in for Atalanta, close to Fiorentina's area.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Claudio Cesare Prandelli is making the team's fifth substitution at Gewiss Stadium with Antonio Barreca replacing Cristiano Biraghi.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Gewiss Stadium.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Ruslan Malinovskyi with Luis Muriel. This is the first substitution made today by Gian Piero Gasperini.
Jose Luis Palomino is replacing Cristian Romero for the home team.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Atalanta.
In the minute 76, In Bergamo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Atalanta.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
In the minute 79, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Atalanta.
Franck Ribery (Fiorentina) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Johan Mojica is replacing Robin Gosens for the home team.
Sam Lammers is on a sub for Duvan Zapata for Atalanta.
Maurizio Mariani awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Maurizio Mariani signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Atalanta's half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Atalanta to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 84, Atalanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Atalanta in Bergamo.
Remo Freuler of Atalanta gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 86, Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Antonio Barreca of Fiorentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Atalanta needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atalanta's half?
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Atalanta in their own half.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Atalanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atalanta are pushing forward but Sam Lammers's finish is wide of the goal.
Corner awarded to Atalanta.
Atalanta's Johan Mojica gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Atalanta's Jose Luis Palomino has run offside.
Ball safe as Atalanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has come to a close in Bergamo. The final score is 3-0.
